MIDATA platform

This is the Javadoc documentation of the MIDATA platform.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
actions
Various wrappers and their annotation definitions for handling requests from different sources.
controllers
Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests.
controllers.admin
Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests for ADMIN users.
controllers.apps
Package containing plugin specific controllers.
controllers.members
Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by MIDATA members.
controllers.providers
Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS.
controllers.research
Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by RESEARCHERS.
models
Package containing all data classes that are stored in the database.
models.enums
Package containing all enumeration classes
models.records
Package containing special record types used by the platform itself.
utils
Package containing utility classes
utils.access
Package containing the RecordManager and query engine.
utils.access.index
Package containing classes to build, maintain and query encrypted indexes
utils.access.op
Package containing helper classes to execute mongo queries on in memory records
utils.auth
Package containing classes for authorization and authentication of users and services
utils.collections
Package containing helper functions
utils.db
Package containing classes needed for database access and mapping
utils.evolution
Package containing classes for automatic account schema evolution
utils.exceptions
Package containing exception classes used by the platform.
utils.fhir  
utils.json
Package containing JSON utilities
utils.mails
Package containing classes for sending eMails
utils.rules
Package containing classes for study participant selection rules
utils.sandbox  
utils.search
Package containing classes for search functions
utils.servlet  
This is the Javadoc documentation of the MIDATA platform.

The controllers, that are the classes that handle the requests to the platform can be found in the controllers package and the controllers.* subpackages.

The classes containing the various types of data that is stored in the database can be found in the models package.

Request wrappers for the different sources of requests can be found in the actions package.

The query and management engine for the data records can be found in the utils.access package.

The functions for database access can be found on the utils.db package.
